**Timestamp:** 2017-04-27_22.48.20

**Experiment:** Minimization Trick 3a

**System:**
Z' = Z * (-e + u_c * C + u_g * G) 
C' = C * (a_c * P - u_c * Z) - m * C * Z 
G' = G * (a_g * P - u_g * Z) + m * C * Z 
P' = P * (-a_g * G - a_c * C) + e * Z 
e = 1.4; u_c = 2.01; u_g = 1.3; a_c = 5.723; a_g = 2.114; m = 1.121
